Control Name: 3.4.3 A process for provisioning and de-provisioning capacity has been established.
Control Statement: Codifying and automating the process helps to avoid human error, varying results and to speed up the overall process.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.4 How have you accounted for capacity and scaling requirements of your workload?
